alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:50AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan and northern Gove Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 149 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Gove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Grainfield. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 85 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
